info.name: Supabase Make Dashboard Side Column Wider
info.description:
When using the Supabase dashboard, make the side column wider so that you can read the end of your query/table/function names more easily.

Fairly crude but forces the existing fixed width side column to be 400px wide, so that if like me, you can rarely read some of your longer table/query names, now you can! 

I wish Supabase would make the side column resizeable, but until then, here's my little hack I use daily.
